fields.name: Table Model

document.title: Table

description.title: The Table description schema
examples: Represents the various modifiers / stats for a character based on age / term.
List of available languages and the groups and families they belong to.

document.description: Data required to populate a table object.

fields.read_me:
Table Model
==========
Description
------------
This schema is for a table object. There are three required fields in the json object: name, columns and rows 

Example
--------
Below is an example of the minimum json object based on this schema:

```{
  "name": "Consolidated Effects of Age",
  "description": "Represents the various modifiers / stats for a character based on age / term.",
  "columns": [
    "Term",
    "Start Age",
    "End Age",
    "ST*",
    "STR Loss",
    "AGL Loss",
    "CON Loss",
    "INT Loss"
  ],
  "rows": [
    ["1", "17", "21", "**", "-", "-", "-", "-"],
    ["2", "21", "25", "5", "-", "-", "-", "-"],
    ["3", "25", "29", "4", "-", "-", "-", "-"],
    ["4", "29", "33", "3", "-", "Y", "-", "-"],
    ["5", "33", "37", "2", "-", "Y", "-", "-"],
    ["6", "37", "41", "1", "Y", "Y", "-", "-"],
    ["7", "41", "45", "1", "Y", "Y", "-", "-"],
    ["8", "45", "49", "1", "Y", "Y", "Y", "-"],
    ["9", "49", "53", "1", "Y", "Y", "Y", "-"],
    ["10", "53", "57", "1", "Y", "Y", "Y", "-"],
    ["11", "57", "61", "1", "Y", "Y", "Y", "-"],
    ["12", "61", "65", "1", "Y", "Y", "Y", "Y"]
    ],
    "footnotes": [
      ["*","ST = Number of Subsequent Term skills."],
      ["**", "This number will vary depending upon the first term skills of the first career the character enters."]
      ]
}```

fields.name: Book Model

document.title: Book

pages.title: The Book pages schema
pages.description: The number of pages in the book.

format.title: The Book format schema
format.description: The format the book was published in.

isbn 10.title: The Book ISBN-10 schema
isbn 10.description: The catalog number associated with the book from the publisher.

isbn 13.title: The Book ISBN-13 schema
isbn 13.description: The catalog number associated with the book from the publisher.

description.title: The Book description schema
examples: Nuclear War has decimated the US, Europe and Asia. You are trying to survive in this new world, where modern technology is dying, roving bands of marauders want your provisions, and radiation is everywhere. Will you survive to find a way home?

Shapes that rip and tear. Shadows that live in corners. Windows in space and time that lead to realms of madness and decay. A dark lurking horror that feeds off the echoing anguish of a billion tortured souls. This is the center of a twisted, sinister conspiracy which threatens the very existence of all humankind. Set in the near future, the world of Dark Conspiracy is dramatically altered from today and is fraught with peril and challenges. The Metroplexes, where most of the world's population lives, are a blend of lawless gang turf and corporate fortresses ruled by men and women powerful enough to be above the law. The countryside is sparsely inhabited, its natives suspicious and violent. And increasing areas of countryside are turning into Demonground, from which few humans return.

short title.title: The Book short title schema
short title.description: The short version of the title for the book.

catalog number.title: The Book catalog number schema
catalog number.description: The catalog number associated with the book from the publisher.

document.description: Data required to populate a book class.

fields.description: Data required to populate a book object.
fields.read_me:
Book Model
==========
Description
------------
This schema is for a book object. There are only three required fields in the json object: title, publisher and page count.

Example
--------
Below is an example of the minimum json object based on this schema:

```{ "title": "A Tale of Two Cities", "publisher": "Chapman & Hall", "pages": 341 }```
